net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock
Class TransportBridgeBlock

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.common.fblock.Entity
      net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.FunctionBlock
          net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.TransportBridgeBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface, MessageHandler, SubscriberCallback
public class TransportBridgeBlock
extends FunctionBlock
implements MessageHandler

Serves as the glue that connects the Transport mechanism with the intra-VM communication fabric on the server.
